draganddrop.incorrecttext: Please rearrange any options that are red and try again.

dropoptions.drop1: Using something the user has and something the user knows to grant access to sensitive resources.
dropoptions.drop2: A tool that can filter specific types of data to protect the data from getting exfiltrated.
dropoptions.drop3: Systems that limit connections to computer networks.
dropoptions.drop4: A tool that allows administrators to audit who has accessed different resources.
dropoptions.drop5: A method of protecting data in transit by creating an encrypted connection over a less secure network.
